effect: The Pokémon cannot use held items that have a direct effect in battle (e.g., berries, choice items). It can still hold items for other purposes (e.g., evolution items, mail).
synergies: Items that cause negative effects when held (e.g., Flame Orb, Toxic Orb)
notes: Often used to disrupt opponents by passing detrimental items via Trick. Does not prevent the use of Mega Stones or Z-Crystals.
